verses.roman:
nigūḍha caitanya-līlā bujhite kā'ra śakti?
sei bujhe, gauracandre yāṅra dṛḍha bhakti

synonyms: nigūḍha—very deep; caitanya-līlā—the pastimes of Lord Caitanya; bujhite—to understand; kā'ra—of whom; śakti—the power; sei bujhe—he understands; gauracandre—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yāṅra—whose; dṛḍha bhakti—fixed devotion.
translation: The pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are very deep. Who can understand them? Only one who has firm, deep devotion to His lotus feet.
